website_summaries.verdict: No-frills wireless mouse that is ready to go as soon as you plug in the compact USB dongle.
pros: A lightweight and affordable wireless mouse with a 1,200 DPI optical sensor
Built-in storage for the USB dongle
cons: A few customers had issues with powering the mouse after replacing the batteries

customer_reviews.title: Don't regret it
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant getting a mouse for my ThinkPad and was going to go with a generic one (any lowest priced wireless mouse available). However, I decided to splurge and get the ThinkPad mouse.. I do not regret it! It's so light and it is plug-and-play. I can't believe I waited so long to get a mouse for my laptop-- working on it is easier now. If you have a ThinkPad don't get a regular wireless mouse-- get the ThinkPad mouse!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: No bells and whistles, just a great mouse
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why but I really love Lenovo’s mice. I hate a mouse that’s too small and these are just the right size. Easy plug-and-play usb operation (I don’t even mess with Bluetooth mice anymore as it seems pointless and less reliable). The magnetic cover is also a very clever touch that makes it a piece of cake to change the battery and clean. Great mouse, great price, zero complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: the item worked for three good months then just stopped working I have replaced the battery with three different types of batteries thinking maybe it was the type of battery but nothing I had such high hope thanks a lot for breaking my heart. please tell me what to do about this item.
customer_reviews.author: stella vigilant

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use the mouse for gaming but I guess it's not comfortable for that purpose, that's my assumption. However, I use it a lot and I'm very happy about it. Easy to use and move around
customer_reviews.author: AMZ

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Finally wire free! Unpackaged the mouse and I am very happy with this purchase. I was worried at first that it might be too small but it is just perfect and easy to store it in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Center click good for CAD
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I use for CAD 3D drafting, so I need the center click a lot, and it is easy to use. Mouse has great responsiveness, comparable to a wired mouse. Mouse is smaller than a full size. I wish it was slightly larger, but I got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It sure is a wireless mouse.
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is nothing special. The top cover is very clearly a cheap plastic that I don't imagine will hold up being dropped from too far up. That said, does what you want a mouse to do. Is pretty sharp with its sensor. I struggle to say I'd recommend this mouse, because it is a bit small in my hands. Still, gets the job done. Extra points for ThinkPad branding.
customer_reviews.author: D.A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: I Love it
customer_reviews.text: My old one stop working so I seen this laser one and I'm glad I did, it's smooth easy to use, I really like it and I received it really quick. I will definitely buy from these guys again, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: beverly from Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling mouse and matches my x230
customer_reviews.text: This feels just like my wired office Lenovo mouse. My only issue is that you remove the whole top of the mouse which is held on by a magnet. If you drop this mouse it'll split open so he careful.
